channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Immigration enforcement surge begins in Charlotte, North Carolina, officials confirm
item.description: Federal officials have started a surge of immigration enforcement in Charlotte, North Carolina. Agents were seen making arrests on Saturday.

item.title: MAGA rift grows as Trump feuds with Greene before key 2026 midterm elections
Homeland Security agents surge into North Carolina’s largest city. Here’s what to know
